verses.verse: Then I looked<WH7200>, and, behold, in the firmament<WH7549> that was above the head<WH7218> of the cherubims<WH3742> there appeared<WH7200> over them as it were a sapphire<WH5601> stone<WH68>, as the appearance<WH4758> of the likeness<WH1823> of a throne<WH3678>.

And he spake<WH559> unto the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> with linen<WH906>, and said<WH559>, Go in<WH935> between<WH996> the wheels<WH1534>, even under the cherub<WH3742>, and fill<WH4390> thine hand<WH2651> with coals<WH1513> of fire<WH784> from between<WH996> the cherubims<WH3742>, and scatter<WH2236> them over the city<WH5892>. And he went in<WH935> in my sight<WH5869>.
Now the cherubims<WH3742> stood<WH5975> on the right side<WH3225> of the house<WH1004>, when the man<WH376> went in<WH935>; and the cloud<WH6051> filled<WH4390> the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691>.

Then the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> went up<WH7311> from the cherub<WH3742>, and stood over the threshold<WH4670> of the house<WH1004>; and the house<WH1004> was filled<WH4390> with the cloud<WH6051>, and the court<WH2691> was full<WH4390> of the brightness<WH5051> of the LORD's<WH3068> glory<WH3519>.

And the sound<WH6963> of the cherubims'<WH3742> wings<WH3671> was heard<WH8085> even to the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691>, as the voice<WH6963> of the Almighty<WH7706> God<WH410> when he speaketh<WH1696>.

And it came to pass, that when he had commanded<WH6680> the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> with linen<WH906>, saying<WH559>, Take<WH3947> fire<WH784> from between the wheels<WH1534>, from between the cherubims<WH3742>; then he went in<WH935>, and stood<WH5975> beside<WH681> the wheels<WH212>.

And one cherub<WH3742> stretched forth<WH7971> his hand<WH3027> from between the cherubims<WH3742> unto the fire<WH784> that was between the cherubims<WH3742>, and took<WH5375> thereof, and put<WH5414> it into the hands<WH2651> of him that was clothed<WH3847> with linen<WH906>: who took<WH3947> it, and went out<WH3318>.
Â¶ And there appeared<WH7200> in the cherubims<WH3742> the form<WH8403> of a man's<WH120> hand<WH3027> under their wings<WH3671>.

And when I looked<WH7200>, behold the four<WH702> wheels<WH212> by<WH681> the cherubims<WH3742>, one<WH259> wheel<WH212> by<WH681> one<WH259> cherub<WH3742>, and another<WH259> wheel<WH212> by<WH681> another<WH259> cherub<WH3742>: and the appearance<WH4758> of the wheels<WH212> was as the colour<WH5869> of a beryl<WH8658> stone<WH68>.
And as for their appearances<WH4758>, they four<WH702> had one<WH259> likeness<WH1823>, as if a wheel<WH212> had been in the midst<WH8432> of a wheel<WH212>.

When they went<WH3212>, they went<WH3212> upon their four<WH702> sides<WH7253>; they turned<WH5437> not as they went<WH3212>, but to the place<WH4725> whither the head<WH7218> looked<WH6437> they followed<WH3212><WH310> it; they turned<WH5437> not as they went<WH3212>.

And their whole body<WH1320>, and their backs<WH1354>, and their hands<WH3027>, and their wings<WH3671>, and the wheels<WH212>, were full<WH4392> of eyes<WH5869> round about<WH5439>, even the wheels<WH212> that they four<WH702> had.
As for the wheels<WH212>, it was cried<WH7121> unto them in my hearing<WH241>, O wheel<WH1534>.

And every one<WH259> had four<WH702> faces<WH6440>: the first<WH259> face<WH6440> was the face<WH6440> of a cherub<WH3742>, and the second<WH8145> face<WH6440> was the face<WH6440> of a man<WH120>, and the third<WH7992> the face<WH6440> of a lion<WH738>, and the fourth<WH7243> the face<WH6440> of an eagle<WH5404>.
And the cherubims<WH3742> were lifted up<WH7426>. This is the living creature<WH2416> that I saw<WH7200> by the river<WH5104> of Chebar<WH3529>.

And when the cherubims<WH3742> went<WH3212>, the wheels<WH212> went<WH3212> by them<WH681>: and when the cherubims<WH3742> lifted up<WH5375> their wings<WH3671> to mount up<WH7311> from the earth<WH776>, the same wheels<WH212> also<WH1992> turned<WH5437> not from beside<WH681> them.
When they stood<WH5975>, these stood<WH5975>; and when they were lifted up<WH7311>, these lifted up<WH7426> themselves also: for the spirit<WH7307> of the living creature<WH2416> was in them.
Then the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> departed<WH3318> from off the threshold<WH4670> of the house<WH1004>, and stood<WH5975> over the cherubims<WH3742>.

And the cherubims<WH3742> lifted up<WH5375> their wings<WH3671>, and mounted up<WH7426> from the earth<WH776> in my sight<WH5869>: when they went out<WH3318>, the wheels<WH212> also were beside<WH5980> them, and every one stood<WH5975> at the door<WH6607> of the east<WH6931> gate<WH8179> of the LORD's<WH3068> house<WH1004>; and the glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was over them above<WH4605>.
This is the living creature<WH2416> that I saw<WH7200> under the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> by the river<WH5104> of Chebar<WH3529>; and I knew<WH3045> that they were the cherubims<WH3742>.

Every one<WH259> had four<WH702> faces<WH6440> apiece<WH259>, and every one<WH259> four<WH702> wings<WH3671>; and the likeness<WH1823> of the hands<WH3027> of a man<WH120> was under their wings<WH3671>.

And the likeness<WH1823> of their faces<WH6440> was the same<WH1992> faces<WH6440> which I saw<WH7200> by the river<WH5104> of Chebar<WH3529>, their appearances<WH4758> and themselves: they went<WH3212> every one<WH376> straight<WH5676> forward<WH6440>.
